title: [RESOLVED] Game Start / Game Disconnect Issues - 17/03/2016
body:
Hi All,

We're aware of issues that are currently occurring with starting and being disconnected from games. We're currently working on a solution to this issue and will update this thread as soon as possible.

**UPDATE: **

**22:30 AEDT**: Loss forgiven has been turned on - and ranked queues are currently disabled. We're currently working on identify the cause of these issues. 

**23:15 AEDT**: We've found an issue with an upstream provider and will change-over users on that provider to another provider temporarily. This will have a very small period during which you may be disconnected, but after the changeover should lead to improved reliability.

**00:15 AEDT**:  Our upstream provider has been able to identify and resolve the issue at their end - preventing the need for the changeover from the previous update. As of now, player connectivity appears to have stabilised  and we're now turning off loss forgiven and re-enabling ranked.

replies.body: so "Loss forgiven has been turned on" doesn't help any of us that reported it in the first place right as it is not retroactive?
Wanted to +1 this, those of us unlucky enough to experience the disconnects before loss forgiven was turned on are just SOL?
Unfortunately that's how it works... {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Thank you. Would love a lose prevented
i agree whole-heartedly
Me too. Winning lane then DC and can't even log in
Got leaverbuster from all the random d/c. Thankyou based riot.
riot is annoying with this thing

definately not fixed, please dont make stupid threads that just cause everybody to play again and lose ranked games+low priority ques.

soz 4 rage... come home after 10 hours of work... i just wanna eat my steak and play :,( but my stake cold and my game dc
Just had it twice in two unranked games. Was able to rejoin, but only after forcibly ending all the LoL processes through task manager, and restarting the client.
I'm dc'ing during a ranked match after it's been turned on again.
yeah i got it again too, not fixed

i just disconnected from game even though my internet is still up and running, even though game instantly ended (might have been server dc or restart or something).

Please tell me this issue isnt still happening?
Also rip 6 provisional games... i went 4-0 to 4-6 and got put in low priority que

Just lost two ranked games because of this. The 2nd time it happened i managed to get back into the game after spamming the reconnect button with frustration.

Two other people on my team also got disconnected and so did another player on the opposite team.
Do we get ip refunded from the disconnects earlier in the day?
+1, Believe of was one of the first affected, Still lost my LP and Got a defeat on my match history even though 4 players on my team disconnected {{champion:32}}

Would love a loss-prevented, was unfair for either team to win in, my team had 3 dc including myself on Spark NZ internet. Their team had 1 dc. We still managed to gain a lead amidst multiple dc's, then a big one happened and they took the game shortly after :/ Not a fair game at all, and their 1 dc comes back right at end to win, not cool :/

Any ETA? This is usually the time I play my few games of the night, would love to know if I should just wait it out (eg - if it's only expected to be another 30 minutes of outage) or just go do something else. Rough estimate is fine.

Unfortunately, the nature of issues like this don't really lend themselves to an even remotely accurate ETA until they're pretty much resolved. At this point, though, we believe that the issue has been fixed and you should be good to go!
nothing is fixed
It has not been fixed I just had it happen to me again as if the demotion wasn't enough. And before you say it's my net I had 6 players dc in my game cmon riot.
No shit. This is getting annoying.

> [{quoted}](name=xXxpu55ysl4ya69,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=RF70PdWb,comment-id=001e000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-17T15:03:43.543+0000)
>
> No shit. This is getting annoying.

What he said

internet is very good but I still get DCed before the match starts (loading champions screen) and the game closes itself when I press enter
when I click reconnect I disconnect again for no reason
I got leaverbuster for no reason. riot do something{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
riot you are too lazy
Riot it's still happening im currently getting reported because im sitting on 2.7k ping ( my internet is fine ).
Yeah issues are back. Started with mad packet loss during games and now when attempting to join the champion select screen it's just black.

> [{quoted}](name=Z3npachi,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=RF70PdWb,comment-id=002a,timestamp=2016-03-18T01:33:28.920+0000)
>
> Yeah issues are back. Started with mad packet loss during games and now when attempting to join the champion select screen it's just black.

i had this straight after waiting 10 minutes to get in que :P was pretty annoying aye... to say the least.
I cannot even get past pick and bans. Would let me do anything at that screen and I just get loss in lp and have to wait 30mins to try again
Hi, The DC is still happening. PLEASE FIX RIOT! Would Appreciate a lost prevented. Thank you
Yeah nah it's not fixed.
And where's my 16 LP :(
Hey Riot this is still ongoing...
counted as a defeat. myself and my duo partner Toxicroak just got a defeat. in ranked, after being dc'd half the game. Please tell me this doesn't affect my ranked stuff.
I got put in low priority because of this, can I do anything about this or do i just have to deal with it?
So we loose our streak because of this? Was on a 5 win streak now no fire badge {{item:3751}}
Unfortunately loss-prevention doesn't mean much for me since I got demoted!!
Just keep climbing dude ;){{item:1051}}
loss prevented was turned on still copped the leaver lp loss =/

Friend and I got couldn't connect at all until 20 minutes into the game, where our base was getting destroyed.
I didn't get a loss prevented, but the game after I did.
Any possible way for you guys to retain the lost LP to my team and I?
I'm happy to reply with more information to disconnected lost match.
Hi. Is there an ETA till it's fixed?
I'm with skymesh nbn and mine is disconnecting
lost a ranked match because of this and made my friend loose his series would really like a loss prevented
Thanks Zaps :) Guess you guys know it's IINET that seems to be only affected?

> [{quoted}](name=Argus Of Xenos,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=RF70PdWb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-17T11:20:57.471+0000)
>
> Thanks Zaps :) Guess you guys know it's IINET that seems to be only affected?

If it is ISP based, then perhaps over in NZ Orcon may have been affected as well since it happened to me
Yeah it is ISP based; IINET share their infrastructure with multiple providers. e.g. Adam and Internode.
It's not ISP based, our connection is fine with everything else.
ISP -> Riot not ISP internet connection.
In an odd coincidence I can't log in to DiRt rally online either...  That's never happened before.
